I am...

Enthusiastic and passionate person with a deep interest in understanding the world and life. One of the reasons which brought me to physics and FKS. My interest lies also in chemistry, biology, psychology, theology and informatics.
At the moment, I mostly enjoy my yoga lessons, reading Prattchet's Discworld series, playing the guitar and school semester with really good lessons. Most often by enjoying a good cup of tea.
